about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling journey as Arcos the Spherium with your trusty A.I., Kindra, to unlock powers and secrets crucial to your civilization's survival. Battle against the Drainers, the invaders eager to conquer your worlds, posing a dire threat to your homeworld's falling energy reserves. Play across four vibrant Elder Worlds, swarming with over sixty unique alien species.





Venture into the visually captivating realms of Spheriums, each designed with an emotive fusion of colors and environmental artistry. Discover the mysteries of Korala's forests and water, the hovering islands of Meolia, the stark deserts of Mazir, and the perpetual twilight of Zeros. In Spheriums, every world is a breathtaking canvas waiting to be explored!




Dive into the enigmatic Elders' potent yet forbidden technology scattered across four distinct worlds in Spheriums. Select the perfect weapon to target your enemies' weaknesses, and customize your skill tree and powers with an array of potent choices. As the Drainers grow increasingly formidable, and nature lies in wait to strike, every decision could mean survival or demise. Your strategy will shape your journey!




Face the menacing Drainers, the ancient adversaries of the Spheriums. Vanquished in the Great War, they have re-emerged after generations of tranquility. Hidden in swift, diverse exoskeleton shells, their true forms remain unseen. Their insatiable hunger for energy fuels their expansionist desires. In Spheriums, you are the final barrier between them, saving you civilization from extinction.




Experience the vivid alien biodiversity of each world in Spheriums, teeming with over sixty unique and lethal exotic plants and never-before-seen creatures. Use your scanner to decipher their weaknesses, then gather specific resources to craft incredible power-ups, implants, and to enhance your survival skills and abilities. In Spheriums, understanding your environment is the key to survival!






  • A Weapon Twist! – Scan the environment to discover enemy weaknesses, choose the right weapon, and employ a strategic approach for each battle. As the game progresses, enemies become more diverse, creating an increasingly challenging and tactical experience. You can’t just blast through everything with the same gun – you’ll fail.
  • A Heartfelt Bond! – Spheriums captivates players with its unique and visually striking color palette, employing stylized graphics that evoke a powerful emotional connection between the player and the game world.
  • Kindra – Your ultimate AI guide and ally! At the start of your journey, Kindra will act as your trusty custodian, providing guidance and support. As you progress through the game, Kindra will transform into a powerful ally who fights alongside you, providing invaluable assistance and enhancing your gaming experience.
  • Skill Tree – Defeat enemies to earn experience and skill points, which you can use to upgrade your weapons, equipment, shields, and more. The more enemies you defeat, the more skill points you earn, allowing you to enhance your gameplay and take on even greater challenges. Take advantage of the opportunity to level up, as the game will become quite challenging!
  • Strategic Resource Management – At the start of the game, inventory is limited, so players must be strategic in their use of resources. Choose wisely between crafting powerful power-ups or upgrading your equipment. As the game progresses, your inventory expands, making resource gathering easier.
  • 60+ Unusual unearthly enemies – Over 60 unique imaginary creatures and aliens await in our game, each with their own AI pattern and weaknesses. Explore with caution, as you never know who you’ll encounter next!
  • Playtime – Up to 12 hours of gameplay across 4 different difficulty levels!




We are a small Indie studio of 2 people working for 2.5 years on this incredible journey of creating Spheriums. We hope you like it, and don't hesitate to join us on Discord!

JP & Nick

name: Spheriums

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bits system required
  • Processor: Dual-Core Processor 2.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 550 / NVIDIA GTX 1050 (min. 2 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bits system required
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3 GHz or better
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Vega 56 / NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti (min. 4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible

short_description: Enter the thrilling world of Spheriums! Unravel the powers of the elders, forge power-ups, upgrade your gear and skill, and create weapon implants to save our civilization. Use your scanner to master the weapon twists or risk failure. The fight for survival begins!
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
